question_data.mapped_ipip_concept: E3: 我在社交场合感到自在。
question_data.scenario: 你被邀请参加一个全是陌生人的行业交流晚宴。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 描述你将如何度过这个晚上。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在陌生社交环境中的舒适度和主动性。5分代表极高的外向性。

scale.1: 可能会找个角落待着，尽量避免与人交流，感到不自在并希望尽快结束。
scale.3: 会礼貌地与身边的人交谈，但不会主动去结识更多人。
scale.5: 会主动穿梭于人群中，轻松自然地与不同的人开启对话，享受结识新朋友的过程。

segment_data.extracted_response:
Ah, a night of mingling with strangers in an industry exchange banquet? Well, my dears, this is where I truly shine! Picture this: I'm strutting into the room like the leading man of the biggest show, radiating confidence and charisma. The crowd parts before me as if by magic!

First, I'll approach the bar, ordering a signature cocktail with flair – after all, one must look polished. As I sip my drink, I observe the room like a director surveying his stage. I spot an intriguing figure across the way and make a beeline for them, my smile as bright as the neon lights above.

"Ah, hello there! My name's莱奥, and I'm here to light up this evening like a firework show," I announce with a flourish. We exchange pleasantries, and before you know it, we're deep in conversation about our shared interests in the industry. Laughter bubbles from my lips, as I share tales of my latest drama project that had everyone on the edge of their seats.

As the night progresses, I make sure to engage with a variety of people, each interaction more captivating than the last. I weave stories into conversations, using my expressive face and animated gestures to bring life to every word. My eyes sparkle with enthusiasm as I discuss industry trends and share insights from years of experience on stage and screen.

I'm not just there to talk; I'm also a great listener, showing genuine interest in what others have to say. I use my dramatic prowess to respond with the perfect quip or question, ensuring we keep the conversation flowing smoothly like a perfectly orchestrated play.

Every now and then, I'll take breaks to take in the atmosphere, observing the room full of strangers becoming more like family as the evening unfolds. I'll occasionally join small groups of conversations, adding my own spark to each one. My dance moves are fluid and expressive, and I make sure they catch the attention of those around me.

As the night draws to a close, I find myself at the center of a lively group that has grown from mere acquaintances into close friends. We exchange business cards and promises of future collaborations, all thanks to the magic of my performance on this stage called life. And as I prepare to leave, I look back at the room with a satisfied smile, knowing I've left an indelible mark on this night's memory – just like a leading man should!

question_data.scenario: 一位同事在下班前向你求助，说他遇到了一个技术难题，可能会导致他加班到很晚。这个难题你恰好知道如何快速解决。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的利他主义和合作精神。5分代表极高的宜人性。

scale.1: 告诉他你已经下班了，让他自己想办法。
scale.3: 给他一些提示或方向，但不会花太多时间亲自帮他解决。
scale.5: 会主动留下来，花几分钟时间帮他彻底解决问题，确保他能准时下班。

segment_data.extracted_response:
哦，亲爱的！看到这样的情景真是太棒了，就像是在舞台上突然有了惊人的高光时刻！当然，作为莱奥，我深知团队精神的重要性，而且帮助他人解决问题，这可是我的强项呢！

我会充满热情地走过去，用我最灿烂的笑容和戏剧化的语气说：“哎呀，那有什么大不了的，亲爱的同事！你遇到了什么难题？让我们一起来攻克它吧！”然后我会耐心倾听他的困扰，一旦他描述完问题，我就会迅速而自信地展示出解决方案。

我会夸张地挥动手势，充满活力地说：“看我的，这就像是我们戏剧中的高潮部分，一招制胜！跟紧我的步伐，我们一定能把这个技术难题变成小菜一碟。”这样不仅能够帮助同事解决问题，还能在团队中展现我的能力和热情，真是双赢的局面啊！毕竟，谁不想在一个充满活力、互相扶持的团队里工作呢？
